1315570.name: GameGuru - Tool Shed Pack
1315570.description:
Bring a sense of authenticity to your game levels with the GameGuru tool shed themed asset pack. There are a hundred high quality objects included, here's the full breakdown:

  • 1 x bag
  • 1 x Battery
  • 1 x Bike
  • 1 x Bolt Cutters
  • 1 x Bucket
  • 1 x Car Jack

  • 2 x Chain Saws
  • 1 x Circular Saw
  • 4 x Clamps
  • 1 x Compressed Air tank
  • 1 x Cooler
  • 2 x Drill box
  • 1 x Ear Protection
  • 1 x Fan
  • 3 x Garden Chairs
  • 1 x Gloves
  • 1 x Grill
  • 1 x Grinder
  • 1 x Hacksaw

  • 3 x Impact Drills
  • 1 x Jigsaw
  • 4 x Lawnmowers
  • 1 x Leaf Blower
  • 1 x Mini Fridge
  • 1 x Nail Gun
  • 1 x Box Nails
  • 1 x Paint Tray
  • 1 x Pet Carrier
  • 1 x Portable Welder
  • 3 x Pots
  • 1 x Pot tray
  • 2 x Propane Tanks
  • 1 x Radio
  • 1 x Respirator
  • 1 x Saw
  • 1 x Saw Horse
  • 1 x Shed
  • 6 x Shelf Units
  • 2 x Spirit Levels
  • 6 x Spray cans

  • 1 x Sprayer
  • 1 x Staple gun
  • 2 x Stools
  • 1 x Table Saw
  • 2 x Tackle box
  • 4 x Tarp's
  • 2 x Toolbox
  • 1 x Tool Chest
  • 2 x Trash Cans
  • 1 x Trimmer
  • 1 x Tyre
  • 1 x Umbrella
  • 2 x Vice
  • 1 x Watering Can
  • 1 x Weed Wacker
  • 2 x Welding Helmet
